param.name: Brightness
param.description: Select from 1 (darkest) to 100 (brightest).

param.name: Contrast
param.description: Select from 1 (darkest) to 100 (brightest).

param.name: Saturation
param.description: Select from 1 (lowest) to 100 (highest)

param.name: White Balance R Gain (Manual Mode)
param.description: Red color gain. Affects only in manual white balance mode

param.name: White Balance B Gain (Manual Mode)
param.decription: Blue color gain. Affects only in manual white balance mode

param.name: Shutter Speed (Manual Mode)
param.description: Shutter speed. Affects only in manual exposure mode

param.name: Slowest Shutter (Auto Mode)
param.description: Slowest shutter speed in auto exposure mode

param.name: Exposure Gain
param.description: Exposure gain. Affects only in manual exposure mode

param.name: WDR Mode
param.description: Wide Dynamic Range mode

param.name: BLC Mode
param.description: Backlight Compensation Mode

param.name: AGC Gain
param.description: Maximum light gain settings in low light conditions. Select from 1 (least light) to 255 (most light).

param.name: Video Mirroring
param.description: Mirrors video from left to right

param.name: Video Flipping
param.description: Flips video from up to down

param.name: Line Frequency
param.description: Line frequency (affects only after camera reboot)

param.name: DNR
param.description: Digital noise reduction

param.name: 3D DNR
param.description: 3D digital noise reduction

param.name: Audio-in sensitivity
param.description: Low - 0dB boost, High - 20dB boost

param.name: Audio-out volume
param.description: Select from 0 (most quiet) to 100 (loudest)

param.name: Reboot
param.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reboot the device?
param.description: This operation reboots the device.

param.name: Soft Reset
param.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings (except network) to default?
param.description: Reset settings to factory default except IP settings

param.name: Hard Reset
param.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings (including network) to default?
param.description: Reset all settings to factory default (inÑludes IP settings)
